name: Moderna

why: Partnered with Pfizer for mRNA vaccine development.

why: Early innovator in mRNA vaccine research.

why: Develops self-amplifying mRNA vaccines and therapeutics.

why: Acquired by Sanofi; focused on mRNA therapeutics.

name: Pfizer
why: Collaborated with BioNTech on global mRNA vaccine rollout.

why: Indian biotech developing indigenous mRNA vaccines.

name: Sanofi
why: Investing heavily in mRNA vaccine platforms post-COVID.

name: Modis Therapeutics
why: Focuses on RNA-based rare disease therapeutics.

name: Arcturus Therapeutics
why: Developing LUNAR mRNA vaccine delivery technology.

name: Nature Biotechnology
why: Publishes high-impact biotech research and innovations.

name: Science
why: Covers interdisciplinary biotechnology and life sciences.

name: Cell
why: Publishes cutting-edge molecular biology studies.

name: Nature Medicine
why: Focuses on translational and clinical biomedical research.

name: The Lancet
why: One of the world’s oldest and most respected medical journals.

why: Publishes advances in genomics and genetic engineering.

why: Bridges basic science and clinical application.

why: Covers trends in drug discovery and biotechnology.

why: Publishes high-impact multidisciplinary science research.

why: Covers open-access research across all sciences.

why: Pioneers fundamental biological and neurological research.

why: Leader in biomedical and genomics research.

why: Leading UK molecular biology research center.

why: Advances open-science neuroscience research.

why: Japan’s leading life science and technology research organization.

why: Primary U.S. medical research agency supporting global health innovation.

why: Major European hub for life science research.
